title: Lucky Wallpaper
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>Rikooooo~! Riko, Riko! I need a favor!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>What is it, Mia-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I also want the lucky wallpaper.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Eh? ....Aah, you heard from Setsuna-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Yeah. Well, truth be told, it’s hard to believe that good luck will come your way just because you changed your phone’s wallpaper, but Setsuna said something good happened to her.... So I thought I could at least give it a try.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, something good will really happen, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I’m not a kid. There’s no way I’d believe that. I’m just testing it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Sure. Do try it, Mia-chan.... There, I sent it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>So sweet!! It’s cute!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I hope lots of good things will come to you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
